body_html:
cc_configure is for general gcc (it is rolled-out by default now on Bazel @Head by the way).

There was an error in cc_configure in 0.2.1 that prevents rpath from working correctly and you are hitting it (it should be -Wl,-rpath,... not -Wl,rpath,...)

cc_configure.bzl probably needs to be adapted for the cuda crosstool for TensorFlow, will be happy to provide guidance on doing it.

body:
cc_configure is for general gcc (it is rolled-out by default now on Bazel @HEAD by the way).

There was an error in cc_configure in 0.2.1 that prevents rpath from working correctly and you are hitting it (it should be `-Wl,-rpath,...` not `-Wl,rpath,...`)

cc_configure.bzl probably needs to be adapted for the cuda crosstool for TensorFlow, will be happy to provide guidance on doing it.
